org.apache.kafka.common.serialization

接口 Serializer<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - Type to be serialized from.
    所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    所有已知子接口:
    ExtendedSerializer<T>
    所有已知实现类:
    ByteArraySerializer, ByteBufferSerializer, BytesSerializer, DoubleSerializer, ExtendedSerializer.Wrapper, FloatSerializer, IntegerSerializer, LongSerializer, ShortSerializer, StringSerializer, UUIDSerializer, VoidSerializer

    public interface Serializer<T>
extends java.io.Closeable
    An interface for converting objects to bytes. A class that implements this interface is expected to have a constructor with no parameter.

    Implement ClusterResourceListener to receive cluster metadata once it's available. Please see the class documentation for ClusterResourceListener for more information.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void close()
      Close this serializer.
      default void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configs, boolean isKey)
      Configure this class.
      default byte[] serialize(java.lang.String topic, Headers headers, T data)
      Convert data into a byte array.
      byte[] serialize(java.lang.String topic, T data)
      Convert data into a byte array.

    • 方法详细资料

      • configure

        default void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configs,
                       boolean isKey)
        Configure this class.
        参数:
        configs - configs in key/value pairs
        isKey - whether is for key or value

      • serialize

        byte[] serialize(java.lang.String topic,
                 T data)
        Convert data into a byte array.
        参数:
        topic - topic associated with data
        data - typed data
        返回:
        serialized bytes

      • serialize

        default byte[] serialize(java.lang.String topic,
                         Headers headers,
                         T data)
        Convert data into a byte array.
        参数:
        topic - topic associated with data
        headers - headers associated with the record
        data - typed data
        返回:
        serialized bytes

      • close

        default void close()
        Close this serializer.

        This method must be idempotent as it may be called multiple times.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
